page.title: 08A LORRY DRIVER'S DAY
page.content: My Dad's name is Les and he is a lorry driver. He gets up at 2 in the morning. He has some corn flakes and 2 pieces of toast then he puts on his boots, unlocks the door and goes out. It is about 6 or 7 miles from out house to the yard at Beddington. The lorry that he drives is a DAF 2500 turbo intercooling. The firm he works for is Superdrug, and the car he drives is called an Astra 1600 G1 Estate. My Dad then goes off to the shops that he has to deliver to. He has been up about 5 hours when I get up. Sometimes he has to travel long distances. He delivers nappies, sweets, shampoo, baby powder and razors. He comes home at 4.15 and has a cup of tea and a chat with my Mum.
